comments.title: Beautiful Resort
comments.name: Scott Friedmann
comments.comments: So well designed and laid out, such a beautiful property. Excellent and friendly staff, who go above and beyond. Extremely clean and careful regarding covid precautions, with limits on guest in the lobby, spaced out rooms, strict cleaning measures, and masks worn at all times.

comments.title: Lovely Hotel, Very Comfortable Stay
comments.name: Steven
comments.comments: The facility is wonderfully decorated. The room is extremely comfortable especially the bed & linen used.The staff is very friendly and eager to help with suggesting things to do and places to eat. Renting a free bike to cruise to the beach was a bonus. Would highly recommend Journey for my next stay at the Hamptons.

comments.title: Getaway
comments.name: Griff
comments.comments: Always great trip , rooms are spotless and safe and staff beyond friendly Great location from beach and town and quick zip to Montauk , pool is always spotless and quiet and relaxing highly recommend this East Hampton gem.

comments.title: Stunning East Hampton Oasis
comments.name: Martin
comments.comments: I love this little hotel in the heart of East Hampton. The rooms are magnificent along with the service and amenities. We love the calm vibe and aesthetic along with the entire staff. Walkable and highly recommend!

comments.title: Classic Hamptons, Modern Finishes
comments.name: No name
comments.comments: Journey is a beautifully renovated hotel with modern fixtures and finishes. The room was clean and new. The staff very helpful and they offered breakfast and bikes to ride to the beach. I would stay there again and recommend it to anyone looking to be on the border of East Hampton
